Works for me (no virus either).
Working fine on Windows 7 desktop.  I also have it working perfectly on a HP 311 netbook so I doubt any respectable desktop should have trouble.

I've popped this on the other two torrents, but let's make the trifecta to hopefully pool together what we learn..
To save some grief, you need Service Pack 3 in order to play (I'm on WinXP).  Also, to change your name.. I used good ol' ''Cheat Engine" hex editor, changed all of the instances of SKIDROW to what I want, now they know who's name to say. :) Hope this helps guys, Thank you gamerguuy!
